definition: time/auspicious time/time and date/long period of time/this day
abbr. for 日本[Ri4 ben3], Japan

sentences.english: He knew the end was coming, and he was unsure.
sentences.chinese: 他知道自己時日不多了，而感到惶恐不安。

sentences.english: When the day arrived, the headman assembled all the villagers and led them into the jungle.
sentences.chinese: 到了約定時日，大臣召集全部村民，帶入叢林。

sentences.english: But my people have forgotten me for days without number!
sentences.chinese: 我的人民卻忘了我，時日已久長，無法計算。

sentences.english: There remaineth therefore a rest to the people of God.
sentences.chinese: 由此看來，爲天主的百姓，還保留了一個安息的時日。

sentences.english: The creation of a wider TPP is still some way off.
sentences.chinese: 然而，要打造一個涵蓋面更廣的TPP還有待時日。

sentences.english: The deepest and heaviest love must grow up withthe time.
sentences.chinese: 最深和最重的愛，必須和時日一起成長。

sentences.english: Japan lies third in the quarter-final.
sentences.chinese: 在四分之一決賽時日本排第三。

sentences.english: And as in the days of Noe, so shall also the coming of the Son of man be.
sentences.chinese: 就如在諾厄的時日怎樣，人子的來臨也要怎樣。

sentences.english: My grandfather was dying also and only survived her a few weeks.
sentences.chinese: 外公也時日無多，只比外婆多活了幾個星期。

sentences.english: In time, the foul odor of Roman decadence would grow harder to disguise.
sentences.chinese: 時日一到，羅馬矯飾的頹廢氣味終將難以遮掩。

sentences.english: Both of us knew he had little time left.
sentences.chinese: 我倆都知道他已時日無多了。

sentences.english: And for a while it seemed as if the days of chimney sweeps were numbered.
sentences.chinese: 暫時看來似乎煙囪清掃人的需求也時日無多。

sentences.english: Knowing that he did not have much time left, my grandfather asked my mother to prepare the mourning clothes.
sentences.chinese: 爺爺自知時日無多，吩咐媽媽準備葬禮用的五服。

sentences.english: To know you're close to the end is a kind of freedom.
sentences.chinese: 知道自己的時日對自己無多是一種釋放。

sentences.english: 'Over time there will be thousands of stores in China, ' said Mr. Schultz.
sentences.chinese: 他說，假以時日，中國將出現數千個星巴克咖啡店。

sentences.english: Wu believes it will take years for China to improve its sci-fi filmmaking.
sentences.chinese: 吳豔認爲中國科幻電影製作業的發展尚需時日。

definition: in the end/after all is said and done
a period of time/a while/for a short while/temporary/momentary/at the same time
to release (tension)/relief (from suspense)/to dispel (usu. with negative, unable to forget)
but/yet/however/while/to go back/to decline/to retreat/nevertheless/even though
immediately/at once/at that moment/at the moment
